description: The course is an opportunity to explore various ways of image making though intaglio printmaking. It is a good introduction to experimental drawing, collage, exploration of textures through chemical processes, and digital imaging. The class will challenge the possibilities and ways of creating incisions and textures using copper plates as the matrix, which then will be printed on paper and other materials. The class offers full technical and historical description of each individual process: Dry Point, Etching, Hard ground, Soft Ground, Aquatint, Shine Cole', Spit-Biting, Sugar Lift, Color Printing and Viscosity printing.
name: PRINTMAKING: ETCHING
